titles.title: America's National World War II Museum Expansion Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to make a grant to the National World War II Museum Foundation for facilities and programs of America's National World War II Museum.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1067-1068)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
2/14/2008--Introduced.
America's National World War II Museum Expansion Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to make a grant to the National D-Day Museum Foundation for facilities and programs of America's National World War II Museum in New Orleans, Louisiana.
